posts.title: If you can’t feed a team with two pizzas, it’s too large

posts.title: Every time we launch a feature, people yell at us

posts.title: Always look for the fool in the deal. If you don’t find one, it’s you.

posts.title: If you define yourself by how you differ from the competition, you’re probably in trouble.
posts.author: subham

posts.title: Stay self-funded as long as possible.
posts.author: subham

posts.title: We are currently not planning on conquering the world.

posts.title: It’s not that we need new ideas, but we need to stop having old ideas
posts.author: subham

posts.title: If you can’t feed a team with two pizzas, it’s too large
posts.author: subham

posts.title: Don’t worry about failure; you only have to be right once.

posts.title: Get big quietly, so you don’t tip off potential competitors.
posts.author: subham

posts.title: If you can’t feed a team with two pizzas, it’s too large

posts.title: As long as you’re going to be thinking anyway, think big.
